data.actual_result: If a similar button is on both USB devices, both USB devices will activate
data.expected_result: The keybind only triggers for one controller
data.short_description: Keybinds set for only one USB device will trigger on a similar connected controller/USB device
data.steps_to_repro: - Plug in 2+ USB devices, such as an Xbox One controller - Set a keybind on the first controller - Try using the new keybind on the first controller
